dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is a dataset commonly used as a benchmark in continual federated learning, consisting of 100 classes with 600 images per class, providing a diverse set of images for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Dan Hendrycks

dcterms:description: ImageNet-R is a dataset that evaluates the robustness of models against distribution shifts, consisting of images from the ImageNet dataset altered to create challenging variations.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-R

dcterms:creator: Xingchao Peng
Qinxun Bai
Xide Xia
Zijun Huang
Kate Saenko
Bo Wang
dcterms:description: DomainNet is a large-scale dataset for domain adaptation, consisting of images from various domains and categories, used to evaluate the performance of models under domain shifts.
dcterms:title: DomainNet
